text: "Raindrops" is a dance music song released in 2006 by the British production team Stunt. It was made in Canada by Dave Valler and Gary Johnson, it reached number 8 in Finland. At least six different mixes have been released. ==Raindrops (Encore une fois)== "Raindrops (Encore une fois)" is a 2008 song by the German DJ group Sash! and it features English dance music act Stunt.. It is the first single from Sash's seventh studio album The Best Of which was released on 20 October 2008. ===Charts=== ====Weekly charts==== Chart (2008â€“2012) Peak position ====Year-end charts==== Chart (2008) Position UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 100 Chart (2009) Position Belgium (Ultratop Flanders) 61 ===Certifications=== ==References== Category:2008 songs Category:Sash! songs
title: Raindrops (Stunt song)
